header: The Fourth Vision: The Basket of Summer Fruit

verse: This is what the Lord God showed me: I saw a basket of ripe summer fruit.
Then he asked, “What do you see, Amos?”
The singing women of the palace will wail on that day, declares the Lord God. Many corpses—all over! Silence!”

header: Fraud and Hypocrisy on Holy Days
A Famine of the Lord’s Word
